thread.section_title: Sports - Taft Midway Driller - Taft, CA
thread.title: Lady Wildcats reach 20 win plateau

author: Matt Henry Midway Driller Sports Writer mhenry@taftmidwaydriller.com
title: Lady Wildcats reach 20 win plateau
text: Lady Wildcats reach 20 win plateau Volleyball team sweeps Shafter in three Comment   By Matt Henry Posted Oct. 22, 2015 at 7:41 PM By Matt Henrymhenry@taftmidwaydriller.com Posted Oct. 22, 2015 at 7:41 PM The Taft varsity volleyball team crossed the 20-win mark to their season Thursday evening by sweeping the Shafter Generals 25-13, 25-15 and 25-14 at home. Taft had the momentum from the start by jumping out to a 3-1 lead including the opening two points of the first set. After Shafter tied the score at three, Taft pulled away again with a 3-0 run. The Lady Generals bounced back to tie the score at six before taking a 7-6 advantage. The teams would tie two more times before Taft reeled off a pair of points. Shafter would narrow the deficit down to one at two different times but Taft answered with a 14-3 run to close out the first set. After Taft scored two straight points to open the second set, the teams would tie each other five times with neither side holding a lead larger than two. Following the last tie, Taft attempted to pull away with a 3-0 run but Shafter quickly got whittled the lead down to one. The Lady Generals would narrow the lead down to one at 12-11 but Taft threatened to pull away with a 5-2 run. Shafter would cut the lead down to three before Taft closed out the second set with a 8-1 run. Taft and Shafter traded a pair of points to begin the final set but Taft caught fire with a 5-0 run to lead 7-2. Following a Shafter point, Taft attempted to pull away again with another 7-2 run to lead 14-5. The teams would trade points until Taft outscored Shafter 4-1. After the Lady Generals trimmed the deficit to nine, Taft went on a 4-2 run to win the set and match. By Matt Henry
